## LineItem interface

Interface of a Stripe line item associated with a checkout session. A line item represents an individual item purchased using the session.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LineItem 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [amount?](./firestore-stripe-payments.lineitem.amount.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The amount to be collected per unit of the line item. |
|  [currency?](./firestore-stripe-payments.lineitem.currency.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Three-letter [ISO currency code](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html)<!-- -->, in lowercase. Must be a [supported currency](https://stripe.com/docs/currencies)<!-- -->. |
|  [description?](./firestore-stripe-payments.lineitem.description.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The description for the line item, to be displayed on the Checkout page. |
|  [name?](./firestore-stripe-payments.lineitem.name.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The name for the item to be displayed on the Checkout page. |
|  [price?](./firestore-stripe-payments.lineitem.price.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The ID of the Stripe price. |
|  [quantity?](./firestore-stripe-payments.lineitem.quantity.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The quantity of the line item being purchased. |
